website_summaries.verdict: This unit makes ready-to-roll cones in the color and level of doneness you select. It maintains its heat so everyone can have a cone quickly.
pros: Makes thin waffle cakes and sugar cones in about 60 seconds
Plastic shaper allows cakes to be rolled into cones
Lights and latch make it very easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I've never used a traditional krumkake cast iron but knew I needed something easier. This iron was perfect. It heats up quickly, and it's not hard to adjust so that the krumkake comes exactly how you want it. I did find a recipe for the cakes on pinterest that I like better than what was in the recipe book but that's just my taste. Would definite recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joy McGregor

customer_reviews.title: First time out of the box PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell rang I opened the box- made the batter -plugged in the machine (had a bowl of vegetable oil and a paper towel in hand ) and each time I made one of these little gems I re-applied a little more of the oil the vegetable oil on the machine!! perfect 🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉
customer_reviews.author: TABLE MANNER EXPERT

customer_reviews.title: I loved having krumcake as a child and now I can ...
customer_reviews.text: This appliance works really well! I loved having krumcake as a child and now I can make them whenever I want with ease! It's very easy to clean and makes the entire process easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Eller

customer_reviews.title: Utter garbage
customer_reviews.text: Heat turns off and on randomly (mostly not at all) because the hinge in the back where the temperature sensor is triggered is way way way too loose so the sensor never kicks in resulting in completely unpredictable results. Waste of time and money. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Krumkake 839 review
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Chef's Choice 839 KrumKake Express Krumkake Cookie Maker. Although temperature control is very good and they were easy to clean and to use, the hardwares did not withstand. On one, the latch never shuts right and after 5 uses, it broke off. On the other, the red light never come on from day 1. When I called Amazon to see if I can return them, they told me the warranty time of 30 days had passed so I am stuck with both. They do the job and the krumkakes come out good, but I would give 1 star for the durability. The parts don't seem to last well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Le

customer_reviews.title: It looked like the latch had previously been glued back on which ...
customer_reviews.text: the latch broke on the first time I used it and that was so frustrating. It looked like the latch had previously been glued back on which was strange. I never returned it because I was in a pinch to get my baking done so I used it and held it together while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing-easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s family makes Krumkake every Christmas, and he wanted one for our family since we no longer are able to spend as many Christmases as we used to. My husband thought this one was amazing! It works great, and it’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: McKell Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & made wonderful krumkakes
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use & made wonderful krumkakes. I made several batches this Christmas and gave them away to family & friends. Everyone enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the novice and for the experienced.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been baking Krumkake for over 55 years using many irons. This one is easy to use, clean and store. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best electronic Krumkake iron I have used
customer_reviews.text: Best electronic Krumkake iron I have used! Very easy and consistent, low burning/fire hazard, and love the color adjustment knob. I just wish the krumkake came out a little thinner. The plastic roller is not grandma's wood one, but it is the closest you can find now a days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dalene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I used to make Krumkake with my Aunt every year during the Scandinavian festival when I was a kid. I wanted to make it again to surprise her. This iron worked perfectly. The Krumkake turned out just as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: May buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Just used this iron this season. We also use 2 cast iron ones (mass production for a large family) Worked well. Easy to use and adjust temp. Can’t tell difference on finished Krumkager. Only thing missing was “traditional memories “.
customer_reviews.author: JANE MYHRER

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 838 model. Does not cook evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I had the Chef's choice 838 waffle cone model for years and loved it until the surface became non-stick and I decided to replace it with this one (839 krumkake). I had high hopes after reading all the great reviews, but this does not cook evenly like the 838 model. Maybe I got a dud, but this practically burns the outer 1.5", while the inside stays white and soft. I have been making waffle cones for years and perfected my recipes to make crispy cones, so it's not my batter. I am returning it, and going back to the 838 waffle cone model.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for waffle cones/bowls
customer_reviews.text: We made waffle bowls with this for ice cream and it was so easy and delicious. Used a small glass bowl to lay the hot krumkake over and gently molded it around the bowl to get the right shape. Cooked evenly and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an electric iron instead of a stove top iron. This one worked really well for a beginner. Once I got a really good recipe and dialed the temp in, I was ready to make a bunch to share. Really happy with this iron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven batter cooking
customer_reviews.text: The batter does not distribute evenly despite being both in the center and also a bit above the center as the instructions suggest. Also the heat must be uneven as one side burns and the other side is pale. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: Since I have a glass top stove I didn’t want to use the old fashioned Krum Kaka Iron of my mom’s ~ this is easy to use ~ perfect “cookie” each time ~ easy to clean & doesn’t take up much room...
customer_reviews.author: AgateVicki

customer_reviews.title: That’s we are looking for! Great waffles maker!
customer_reviews.text: Great waffle maker! Checked all comment, and a bit afraid the result of some people. So our first waffle was great! We are cooking every week now. 90% is recipe and 10% is waffle maker = Tasty Waffle
customer_reviews.author: Aibek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I've received this on Saturday and use it Sunday to make crepe style cookies. Use it for about 30 minutes. The cover for the power light indicator popped open. Keep in mind, it wasn't drop at any point and simply sitting on the counter top. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T La

customer_reviews.title: Works great for one person
customer_reviews.text: Love it, made my first batch with my recipe and it’s great, evenly brown, I set it almost on 3
customer_reviews.author: Boss Hog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We've used this twice now with excellent results, and love the recipes included! Only drawback is the learning curve on the baking lights, but figured it out. Makes perfect Krumkake!!!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: RFMK Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The last time I made krumkake was over 20 years ago and I am so impressed with the ease of making them with an electric maker. Perfect krumkake from the very first one. Clean up was just a quick wipe down with a damp cloth. The cone for rolling worked great. I also used a muffin tin to make cups to fill. I used a crepe turner to remove them from the iron and it worked great. The booklet that comes with the iron is written very plainly and easy to understand. I used one of the recipes in the booklet and they are great. LOVE the non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes my krumkake quicker and just as crisp
customer_reviews.author: METTA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! So easy to use my kids can use it too. We made these to add to our Christmas goodie boxes. Big hit! Looks so fancy but easy to make.
customer_reviews.author: Horraxe

customer_reviews.title: Makes Lacy Krumkake
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this krumkake iron. I used my daughter's which makes 2 at a time but it does not get as nice as with this one. They get very very thin and lacy. I also do not have to use a timer, I just go by the red and green lights once I got the hang of it. The teflon coating cleans up very easily and it stores away taking up very little room. I wish I had bought one of these long ago.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Christmas breakfast
customer_reviews.text: First used one at Christmas last year, so much fun, easy & so good
customer_reviews.author: Angelene Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Real cool. Have to get acustom to temperature setting and final product.
customer_reviews.author: FLACO

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for Norwegians easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a Norwegian ancestry I'm missing is product let's go to try so easy to use designs was fantastic I would definitely recommend the electric model
customer_reviews.author: lyle hanson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend. No issues here! This is my 1st krumkake iron. Making these were a breeze, made 20 of them on my own in about an hour. Used my setting at 3, came out beautifully & clean up is so easy! I also like that this machine has a lip that catches any spillage. I brought these over to my In-laws, they were in Awe, not only on how tasty these were, but how beautiful they were (They are Italian, so they have never seen/heard of them before) So glad i bought this, brings back old memories at Grandmas!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I had fun making these at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Our first time making Krumkake and it worked fabulously. My husband and I had fun making these at Christmas. Would like to make another batch but when you make a batch, you eat a batch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Heim

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MACHINE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine!!! It's AMAZING!!! I wish I bought this Krumkake Express Maker years ago!!! My daughter has Food Allergies so I can't just buy anything out there for her to eat. I had to be creative with lots of recipes. I had wanted to give her something like this machine can make but couldn't, now I can with this awesome machine!!! It makes each one so quickly, you'll have to stay there the whole time which what I wanted! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Family4Christ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So great. Have used it & it is simple to use, easy to follow instructions and recipes.
customer_reviews.author: mg2008

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, does exactly as expected super easy to clean - will buy again for gifts
customer_reviews.author: melody mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Unitasker.
customer_reviews.text: Meh it is ok. I mean you have to be really into crumcakes. It is quite a unitasker.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Adams

customer_reviews.title: ... as soon as I got it and it worked great. Haven't had krumkake since I was a kid ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this as soon as I got it and it worked great. Haven't had krumkake since I was a kid and my neighbor made them. Sure this appliance makes it easier. Just put the batter on the plate, close the lid and wait about a minute and you're good to go. The plastic cone worked great for rolling the krumkake.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this on a whim and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim and I'm so glad I did! I have been using the recipe included and the Krumkakes turn out wonderfully. I even made ice cream bowls for my sister's wedding and everyone raved about them. I also love being able to quickly whip up a dessert in the summer without having to turn on the oven. I love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my Norwegian husband, He says it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Vonn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well. Be careful top metal plate gets really hot
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Good design, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My young girls and I love using the mold and making dessert on it. Easy to use, clean and fun overall. Design is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii paradise

customer_reviews.title: Awesomness!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Krumkake maker. I was set on the VillaWare 3900 as my family has one and it does wonders. Since the VillaWare is discontinued I decided to purchase this after reading many reviews. This machine works with my ingredients. The cookies came out thin crispy and seems to brown evenly. Test it out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and cute design. It comes with several recipes that are pretty tasty. We make cones and bowls. Favorite new appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can make krumkake again!
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a home that has an electric range so we could no longer use my parents' krumkake iron. Since purchasing this krumkake maker, we can finally make krumkake again! It's also a lot less mess than the krumkake iron and very easy to clean. My Dad (an old Swede) loved using it so much, I bought one for him!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

customer_reviews.title: Unique crumbcakes and more
customer_reviews.text: I love this funny little machine! It makes crunchy desserts that are unique and delicious. And it works to make grilled cheese sandwiches, too. I use it all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I took a Scandinavian culture class in High School (long...time ago) and have always wanted a Krumkake oven since that time. I found this and got it. I have used it several times and my Krumkakes come out perfect. I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kirajean

customer_reviews.title: uneven baking
customer_reviews.text: I should have stuck with the old cast iron krumkake baker - this one bakes unevenly - middle is not cooked, edges are over-done. No amount of preheating or fiddling with the settings improved it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bestemor2012

customer_reviews.title: ... as prominent on the cookie as I would have liked. Not as pretty as the one my mother ...
customer_reviews.text: Design is not as prominent on the cookie as I would have liked. Not as pretty as the one my mother and grandmother used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this produced.It good I can control the temperature when I bake
customer_reviews.author: Thong Vo

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a “wow” from me
customer_reviews.text: It cooks extremely unevenly and the pattern is hardly noticeable. I’m going to try a different recipe to see if it makes a difference but thus far, I’m unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought double Krumkake machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. I have the old cast iron traditional one but purchased this one to do a demonstration for out local heritage 'Norway Day'. Even the older women who would come along and use it thought it was great. I did regret that I didn't get the double Krumkake maker in the end however. It would have been twice the outcome with same amount of effort.
customer_reviews.author: Donita Zblewski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Krumkake Express makes delicious cookies.
customer_reviews.text: Having never made krumkake before, I found that using the Chef's Choice 839 Krumkake Express made very delicious and evenly browned cookies. The pattern on the griddle is very pretty and clean up is a breeze. I have made 4 batches of cookies in 2 weeks and am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kirk

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. Was a replacement for the Krumkake baker that makes 2 small ones at a time which had completely lost its nonstick property and I could no longer bake one. This one worked perfect from first try!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this long ago.
customer_reviews.text: Fast. Easy to use. Consistent browning. Tough. Tucks into the corner cabinet. Very happy. Waaaaaaaay easier that the iron I used for years that heated up on the stove burner. What was I thinking???? Made 4 dozen cones in an evening with no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It is so much easier than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is so much easier than the old fashioned way! It includes 3 recipes and all are great
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: It exceeds my expectations! I have cooked four batches ...
customer_reviews.text: It exceeds my expectations! I have cooked four batches trying the supplied recipes. OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Grande

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the product and would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My first Krumkakes were a success! My only criticism is a minor one, in my opinion. The color (and therefore crispiness) was consistently darker towards the back of the Krumkake and lighter in the front. Other than that, I am very pleased with the product and would recommend it. I'm starting a new family tradition with the grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Im glad we got this. We revived the old european tradition of krumkake in our household, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: & I loved the Chef's Choice 839 Krumkake Express
customer_reviews.text: I am Norwegian, & I loved the Chef's Choice 839 Krumkake Express. Krumkakene came out " just like my mother made them in Norway". Brings back good memories. Inger Lise [Lisa] Severine
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  Severine

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once. I'm used to the wrought iron stovetop kind, but those can't be used on a ceramic cooktop. My mom bought a similar different iron (not sure what brand but similar to this one) when she got a ceramic cooktop and it wasn't as nice. This has an effective timer system once you get the hang of it, so no more watching the clock. It's variable settings let you fine tune your level of color, from plain white, to lightly browned so the designed shows up, to dark ice cream cone brown.
customer_reviews.author: Cristyn E. B. Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Dream machine
customer_reviews.text: Dream machine! Made over 100 for cookie exchange. Every cookie perfect. Use the Norwegian recipe for lacy Krumkake. Thanks enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam T by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, big enough for ice cream cone sized krumkakes.

customer_reviews.title: but does what I want from it and I love
customer_reviews.text: Uneven cooking, but does what I want from it and I love it

customer_reviews.title: Came in very fast was very happy with the look but it was not closing all ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in very fast was very happy with the look but it was not closing all the way on one side there for one side was burning while the other was still white

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the home baker. Easy to use. Quick recovery temperature control is a super nice feature.

customer_reviews.title: ... this to make fortune cookies and it turns out great. I also makes some gluten free egg rolls ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to make fortune cookies and it turns out great. I also makes some gluten free egg rolls Asian style and it turn out perfect, not too thick or thin and my kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Krumkake are nice and thin. No mess. Baking/ready light are not consistent but also not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Consistent krumkake every time. The recipes in the book work well, but I've also used my husband's grandma's recipe (very Norwegian Minnesota Lutheran) and had fantastic results.
customer_reviews.author: zimme448

customer_reviews.title: We have used it a couple of times and it has produced a good
customer_reviews.text: Obviously light duty but well done. We have used it a couple of times and it has produced a good product
customer_reviews.author: Dusty from Cape Coral

customer_reviews.title: It did not make the cake evenly even though it ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not make the cake evenly even though it was really thin, so I have to returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: T. Su

customer_reviews.title: Strull Iron
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, easy to use krumkake baker. I used a family recipe for the same type of "cookie" but one that is rolled on a tube so both ends are the same. Our Norwegians call them strull. Also used a church recipe with good results. The only negative is that I could not get them as thin as we desired. With the traditional style it seems like you can squeeze the iron and make them thinner. With this iron I made 24 krumkaka and another lady made 60 with hers using the same recipe. So these are nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Skrukrud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Being 100% Norse, yet failing at the usual Krumkake iron, this was the answer to my prayers. I must have made hundreds of these over the holiday with NO issues at all! I used my own recipe and went to work. They all came out beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: blondie2011

customer_reviews.title: Love this Krumkake iron.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make Krumkake for the holidays. It works really well. It takes a little time to figure out how much dough to put on the iron. Once you figure it out, they come out just like Bestamore used to make.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ring

customer_reviews.title: This one worked great from the 1st one to the end
customer_reviews.text: Used a Nordicware stove top one for years - usually burned myself and started a fire on the smooth top range. Usually make them only for Christmas. This one worked great from the 1st one to the end. Easy cleanup. Won’t go back to the old one, Except for using the recipe from the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Purdie

customer_reviews.title: Modern Times Krumkake Maker
customer_reviews.text: Krumkakes are a Norwegian Christmas Cookie. And, NO, they're not traditionally filled with anything. It's a cookie; delicious all by itself. My mother has my grandmother's cast-iron Krumkake maker which you use on a stove-top. This is going to be a Christmas present for her.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It arrived sooner than expected and in great ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It arrived sooner than expected and in great conditon. This electric Krumkake Express maker makes Krumkake a lot easier to make and they don't stick. I love it. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this iron. I do notice ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this iron. I do notice that the center of the krumkake is much lighter in color and I may have to adjust the temp gauge.

customer_reviews.text: I made the krumkake I wanted it for, and they turned out great! So much easier to use than the direct stove model.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everybody needs a krumkake maker the kids will love you as well as the adults!

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice machine to have around if you are Norwegian
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice machine to have around if you are Norwegian. It's a modern machine, but makes classic Krumkake.

customer_reviews.title: She says it’s amazing! Its easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my Mother. She says it’s amazing! Its easy to use, easy clean up and makes perfect krumcakes every time.
customer_reviews.author: frida

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This not only makes delicious krumkake but they're fun to make. Using the krumkake express is actually much easier than the directions imply. Find a simple batter recipe (the one I used was simpler than the ones given with the directions). I even made mine with gluten-free flour and it came out perfect. I filled them with whipped cream and in the summer I plan to fill them with ice cream since gluten-free cones are difficult to find. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Francine

customer_reviews.title: but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks uneven, one side browns about 3x faster than the rest of it. Not the end of the world, but it's annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for those familiar with krukakes. Easy to use and just about runs itself. Also easy to clean. Settings let you get your desired results. Highly recommend this items!!

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I'm happy with it. Everybody in my family like my cake. With Krumkake Express 839I made Krumkake about 6 inches in diameter. I'm looking for a mold that make krumkake about 3 or 4 inches in diameter. Would you please find it for me. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but it bakes a little uneven sometimes. The krumkake and stull still turn out great though.

customer_reviews.title: So many years burning our fingertips on the stove with ...
customer_reviews.text: So many years burning our fingertips on the stove with our old iron. This is really the way to go. Golden brown in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy you use and the recipes are also ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy you use and the recipes are also great. Everyone was impressed at my first batch of krumcakes.

customer_reviews.title: The cookies were uniform and I only wasted the batter from the first cookie due to too ...
customer_reviews.text: After using the stove top version for many years, I was thrilled with the results of this product. The cookies were uniform and I only wasted the batter from the first cookie due to too much oil. I really like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Linton

customer_reviews.title: Decent alternative to manual iron
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Nice to be able to walk away for a moment and the iron maintains the set temperature, unlike using my old manual iron. My only disappointment was that the Krum Kake were thicker than when made manually, not as light and delicate. But of course flavor was the same and they looked beautiful. A good alternative if you don't have or don't want to use a manual iron.
customer_reviews.author: 6308L

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your chef-y son.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 19 year old son (who wants to be a chef) for his 19th birthday. He was pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: ... everything i hoped it would be It is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Krumkake Express is everything i hoped it would be It is so easy to use. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed my new appliance... Plan to use not just at Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: From the first krumkake to the last everyone is perfect. So easy and clean to use.
customer_reviews.author: carol allison

customer_reviews.title: I love this krumkake baker
customer_reviews.text: I love this krumkake baker. I made krumkake with my grandma using a stovetop iron when I was younger. A couple of years ago I bought an electric pizzelle maker thinking I could use it for krumkake. It burned them so I gave it away. I decided to try an electric version again and bought this one since it was specifically for krumkake. It's wonderful. The nonstick surface makes it super easy to get them off the iron. The adjustable knob lets you set it at just the right time so your krumkake are perfection. Now I'm passing the krumkake making tradition to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Verdandi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy to use Krumkake electric iron
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use electric Krumkake iron. Can quickly and easily make batches of Krumkake
customer_reviews.author: JULIE S

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Christmas as a possible Bratzlie press. It worked like a charm. It's a little bigger than a traditional cookie, but who ever ate just one?
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this Krumkake express from Amazon when travelling to US and took it to Brasil. Ariving home, I tested the machine and it works very good. The Krumkakes are crispy and cook fast. I tried several recipies and all of then cooked well in this iron. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heloisa

customer_reviews.title: Grat for pizzelles
customer_reviews.text: Product does exactly what it says. Temperature and lights take some trial and error but once known performs very well
customer_reviews.author: phil micciche

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This did not come with the wooden cone roller that is required to properly roll the krumkake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than standing at the stove with the older one!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

product_meta.title: Chef'sChoice 839 KrumKake Express Krumkake Cookie Maker with Color Select Quick Baking Instant Temperature Recovery Fast Bake Easy to Clean with Overflow Channel Includes Cone Roller, Black
product_meta.description:
The Chef’sChoice® KrumKake Express™ is a complete baking system that includes the cookie maker, a cone rolling form and a selection of favorite Scandinavian and German recipes. This versatile unit features instant temperature recovery so it’s always ready to bake.

AMAZON.COM
Pour a scoop of batter on the decorative, nonstick surface of this KrumKake maker, close the lid, and in only 60 seconds a perfect crepe-like cake is ready. Roll the warm cake around the included plastic form, and the cake hardens as it cools into a crisp cone. Children love the cones filled with softened ice cream, and adults will go nuts over fillings of chocolate mousse or whipped cream and fruit. Recipes in the instruction booklet offer Norwegian, Swedish, and German variations on krumkakes, so that cooks can choose between thick or delicate cakes. A numbered dial setting on the unit adjusts temperature to allow the cake color to range from golden to dark brown. Red and green lights indicate readiness, and a quick reheat time means 20 or more six-inch cakes can be cooked in a short amount of time. The unit is easily wiped clean, stores upright to save space, and comes with a one-year warranty against defects. --Ann Bieri
feature_bullets: KrumKake maker bakes golden crepe-like cakes
Plastic shaper allows cakes to be rolled into cones
Features color selection dial and start-finish baking lights
